evidence.text: 17 | 2022-08-08 | MOTION for Preliminary Injunction Lisa Newman appearing for Plaintiff United States of America. Responses due by 8/29/2022 (Attachments: # 1 Memorandum in Support, # 2 Proposed Order, # 3 Ex. A, Fleisher Declaration, ...)

extracted.value: United States of America filed a Motion for Preliminary Injunction on August 8, 2022, seeking a temporary injunction to halt enforcement of Idaho's abortion laws, with responses due by August 29, 2022.

evidence.text: 15 | 2022-08-08 | Expedited MOTION to Intervene Daniel W. Bower, Monte N Stewart appearing for Intervenor Defendant Speaker of the Idaho House of Representatives Scott Bedke, Idaho Senate President Pro Tempore Chuck Winder, and the Sixty-Sixth Idaho Legislature. Responses due by 8/29/2022 (Attachments: # 1 Memorandum in Support of Motion to Intervene, # 2 Exhibit 1 Proposed Answer)

extracted.value: The Idaho Legislature filed an Expedited Motion to Intervene on August 8, 2022, seeking to join the case as a party, with responses due by August 29, 2022.

evidence.text: 16 | 2022-08-08 | MOTION to Expedite Idaho Legislatures Motion to Intervene Daniel W. Bower appearing for Intervenor Defendant Speaker of the Idaho House of Representatives Scott Bedke, Idaho Senate President Pro Tempore Chuck Winder, and the Sixty-Sixth Idaho Legislature. Responses due by 8/29/2022 (Bower, Daniel)

extracted.value: The Idaho Legislature filed a Motion to Expedite their Motion to Intervene on August 8, 2022, requesting priority consideration of their intervention, with responses due by August 29, 2022.

evidence.text: 69 | 2022-08-17 | MOTION for Leave to File LEGAL ARGUMENTS Daniel W. Bower appearing for Intervenor Defendant Speaker of the Idaho House of Representatives Scott Bedke, Idaho Senate President Pro Tempore Chuck Winder, and the Sixty-Sixth Idaho Legislature. Responses due by 9/7/2022 (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit Legislatures unique legal arguments)(Bower, Daniel)

extracted.value: The Idaho Legislature filed a Motion for Leave to File Legal Arguments on August 17, 2022, seeking to submit additional arguments beyond the scheduled briefing, which was denied by the court.

evidence.text: 74 | 2022-08-17 | MOTION to File Amicus Brief Olivia F. Summers appearing for Amicus American Center for Law & Justice. Responses due by 9/7/2022 (Attachments: # 1 Memorandum in Support, # 2 Proposed Order)(Summers, Olivia)

extracted.value: American Center for Law & Justice filed a Motion to File Amicus Brief on August 17, 2022, seeking to submit a brief in support of the State of Idaho, which was granted by the court.

evidence.text: 87 | 2022-08-19 | MOTION for Leave to File Brief of Indiana and 16 Other States as Amici Curiae in Support of Defendant Thomas Molnar Fisher appearing for Amicus State of Indiana. Responses due by 9/9/2022 (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit Text of Proposed Order, # 2 Memorandum in Support)(Fisher, Thomas)

extracted.value: The State of Indiana, along with 16 other states, filed a Motion for Leave to File Brief as Amici Curiae on August 19, 2022, seeking to submit a joint amicus brief supporting the State of Idaho, which was granted.
